questions.question: Do you or any member of your household have a television?
Do you or any member of your household have a refrigerator?
Do you or any member of your household have a phone?
Do you or any member of your household have a bicycle?
Do you or any member of your household have a car?
Looking at items that you and your household members have. Do you and the members of your household own one or more cheap utensils that are worth less than $ 50 per item?
Looking at items that you and your household members have. Do you and the members of your household possess utensils that worth more than $ 250 per item?
Does your household have electricity?
What kind of floor material is used in your house?

options.name: high quality (floor finished with parquet, carpet, tiles, linoleum, ceramic, etc)
middle quality (cement, concrete, wood, bamboo, etc)

questions.question: How many rooms does your household has for sleeping?
What is the main source of drinking water used by members of your household?

options.name: Shared Deep tube well / shallow tube well

questions.question: What is the main source of water used by your household for other purposes, such as cooking and hand washing?

options.name: Shared Deep tubewell / shallow tube well

questions.question: The rest of the questions is about the main drinking water source. Where is that water collected from?

options: Public tap/standpipe|Deep tubewell/borehole|Shallow tubewell/borehole|Protected dug well|Unprotected dug well|Protected spring|Unprotected spring|Rainwater collection|Cart with small tank/drum|Tanker-truck|Surface water

questions.question: What is the distance to this water source?
How long does it take to go there, get water and come back?
Who usually goes to this source to collect the water for your household?  (only one answer possible)
In the last week (since 7 days ago), how many times has this person collected water?

options: Adult woman|Adult man|Female child (under 15 years)|Male child (under 15 years)

questions.question: Who owns your main water source?
How many years ago was the water connection installed ?
How much water do you get from your main source per day? (in liters)
In the last month, has there been any time when your household did not have sufficient quantities of drinking water?
What was the main reason that you were unable to access water in sufficient quantities when needed?

options.name: Water not always available from source

questions.question: If other, please specify
During the last year, have you experienced one of the following problems/conflicts? - mark which one they have experienced - multiple answers possible
Do you or any other household member do anything to the water to make it safer to drink?
What do you usally do to the water to make it safer to drink?

options.name: Use a water filter (ceramic, sand, composite etc.)

questions.question: Specify
What do you think about the availability of  water treatment products?
What do you think of the prices of treatment products?
Does your household pay for the drinking water?
How much do you on average pay monthly for drinking water? (in local currency)
How do you perceive the amount you pay for drinking water?
In case you have issues with your water supply, do you know where to go to?
In case yes, where could you go to?
Specify
What is your relation with the water related government authority?

options.name: I don't know about a water related government authority
I do know they are there, but I don't know what they are doing
I know they are there and I am informed about what they are doing
I know they are there, I am informed about what they are doing and they are activtely involve community members

questions.question: If other, please specify
Were you consulted on the location of the water point before it was constructed?

options.name: No, I have been asked, but they did not listen to me
No- I was not living here when it was constructed

options: Public tap/standpipe|Deep tubewell/borehole|Shallow tubewell/borehole|Protected dug well|Unprotected dug well

questions.question: Are you able to use this main water source for drinking water all year round?

options.name: No, not in the dry season
No not in the rainy season

questions.question: If no, where do you then get your drinking water from?

options.name: Shared deep tube well/ shallow tube well
Neighbour's tap/shallow tube well/deep tube well

options: No, not in the dry season|No not in the rainy season

questions.question: Has your primary water source been tested for quality?
If yes, who tested it?
If other, please specify
If yes, what was the result?
If no, why not?

options.name: I was not aware about the need for water testing
I didn’t think it is very important to get water tested
I believed that my drinking water is not contaminated
I did not know where and how to get the water tested
It is very expensive and unaffordable to get water tested
It is a very complicated process to get water tested
No one from Government or NGO approached us to offer water testing service

questions.question: Do you want your drinking water quality tested in this survey?
I am giving you a water quality test code
Do you use a latrine/toilet for defecation?
What kind of toilet facility do members of your household usually use for defecation?

options.name: Toilet that flush/pour to flush piped sewer system
Toilet that flush/pour to septic tank
Toilet that flush/pour to pit latrine
Toilet that flush/pour to don't know

questions.question: Specify
Why are you not using a toilet/latrine?

options.name: Bad quality of existing latrines (regardless of type of latrine)
It does not feel safe enough to use the latrine
Preference to defecate in the open
I don't know that I am supposed to use a latrine

questions.question: If other, please specify
Where do you defecate?
If other, please specify
Where is this toilet facility located?
Do you share this facility with others who are not members of your household?
Do you share this facility only with members of other households that you know, or is the facility open to the use of the general public?
How many households in total use this toilet facility, including your own household?
Do you pay for using the latrine?
How much do you pay for using the latrine?
How do you perceive the amount you have to pay for using the latrine?
Were you consulted on the location of the latrine before it was constructed?

options.name: No- I was not here when it was constructed
No- They did not listen to me

questions.question: How do you manage the child stools?
How would you rate the availability of latrine materials and construction services? (e.g. focus on the latrine/pit itself, not the materials for constructing the compartment)
Has your facility ever been emptied?

options: Toilet that flush/pour to septic tank|Toilet that flush/pour to pit latrine|Ventilated Improved Pit latrine (VIP)|Twinpit offset latrine|Pit latrine with slab|Pit latrine without slab/open pit|Composting toilet

questions.question: If yes, how much did it cost? (in local currency)

options: Yes, within the last 5 years|Yes, more than 5 years ago|Yes, but don't know when

questions.question: If yes, how do you perceive this amount?

options: Yes, within the last 5 years|Yes, more than 5 years ago|Yes, but don't know when

questions.question: If yes, the last time it was emptied, where were the contents emptied to?

options.name: By service provider to a treatment plant
By service provider buried in a covered pit
By service provider but don't know where
By household buried in a covered pit
By household to uncovered pit, open ground, water body or elsewhere

options: Yes, within the last 5 years|Yes, more than 5 years ago|Yes, but don't know when

questions.question: If other, please specify
If no, why not?

options.name: Latrine doesn't need to be emptied (biogas, ecosan)

questions.question: If other, please specify
Looking at qualified pit emptiers, what do you think of their availability

options.name: Skilled pit emptiers are well available here
Pit emptiers are well available but not always skilled
Pit emptiers are well available but never skilled
Pit emptiers are not well available

options: Yes, within the last 5 years|Yes, more than 5 years ago|Yes, but don't know when|No, never emptied|Don't know

options.name: There is no household member menstruating

options.name: Yes, because she had a lot of pain
Yes, because school does not have proper WASH facilities
Yes, because they are not allowed to
Yes, but I don’t know why

questions.question: If other, please specify

[introduction] I would like to ask you about investments in your WASH facilities. First I am asking about costs for operation and maintenance. Then I would like to talk about investments for new construction. Is that distinction clear?
[questions about maintenance] During the last year, have you spent money on the operation and maintenance of WASH facilities and services?
If yes, how much? (Local currency)
How would you rate the availability of spare parts and other materials needed for maintaining?
And how do you perceive the costs for this?
[questions about investment] During the last year, have you spend money on the construction of WASH facilities (e.g. latrine, hand washing place or drinking water facility)?
If yes, what was the total amount of money you invested?
Did you take a loan from a financial institutions (incl. MFI)?
What were your other sources of funding?

options.name: Loan from community savings groups/credit groups

questions.question: If other, please specify
How much of your own money did you invest (in local currency)?
How much did you loan from neighbours/friends/relatives?
How much did you get support from neighbours/friends/relatives?
What is the size of the loan (in local currency) from self-help groups?
What is the size of the loan (in local currency) from community savings groups / credit groups?

options: Loan from community savings groups/credit groups

questions.question: What is the size of the loan (in local currency) from financial instutions?
[Enumerator verification] add up all the gifts and loans. Ask if the sum is corect and write it down below
How do you perceive the amount you have invested to construct the latrine?
Have you considered taking a loan from a formal institution?
Why didn't you consider a loan from a formal institution?

options.name: Interest rate is too high / I cannot pay it back
I am not aware, I don't think it is possible
The amount requested is too low, a loan is not possible

Did he/she go to a health facility?

questions.question: Who in your household is part of this water user association?

options.name: With husband or other extended family
